title: Coding For Kids
description: This course introduces kids to the world of coding through interactive and engaging lessons. It covers visual programming with Scratch, web development basics using HTML and CSS, and fundamental programming concepts in Java, Python, and JavaScript.

title: English Foundation Course
description: This course is designed to build a strong foundation in English, focusing on phonetics, fluent speaking, grammar, vocabulary, and practical communication skills. It enhances confidence in both written and spoken English.

title: School Course
description: This course is designed to build a strong foundation in English, focusing on phonetics, fluent speaking, grammar, vocabulary, and practical communication skills. It enhances confidence in both written and spoken English.
